content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #76803 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
I'm curious about this issue. I think the issue reporter is using the wrong TLS cert settings on purpose on example.com and receives a decryption error - am I reading it correctly?
Where is the rust compiler error? :thinking:

There is no obvious rustc error, but the code runs fine and gives a response on nightly-2020-08-17, but fails with the decryption error with every later nightly version. I just reproduced the issue. It fails on nightly but successed on stable.
If someone has time to make an MCVE that would be helpful as well
The new comment is interesting. I have no idea what it has to do with the original example, but it doesn't look very good
i think it's useful to keep a thread open to get wider consensus at least for around a day (also given that we are more members now )
